summary: Frontend testing of 3 major features: HelpGuidePanel integration, DataSourceBadge expansion, and Team Builder enhancements. All 17 features tested successfully.
critical_code_review_comments: HelpGuidePanel component properly integrated across Community Hub, LOGS Analytics, and Help Center
DataSourceBadge correctly shows MOCK DATA on Readiness Snapshot, Skill Coverage, Official Teams, and LOGS Analytics
Team Builder Step 2 has all new enhancements: Team Name input, 8 icon options, 6 color options, team size cap indicator, placeholder slots with SIMULATION badge
Team Builder Step 3 shows Role Coverage with skill names and multiplier counts, team members with initials avatars and match percentages
Language switching (EN/ES) works correctly with no regressions
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: N/A - using mocked data from ConnectionContext (isBackendConnected=false)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 major features tested and working. Key test IDs: help-guide-toggle, help-guide-panel, data-source-badge-readiness-snapshot, data-source-badge-skill-coverage, data-source-badge-official-teams, data-source-badge-logs-analytics. Team Builder accessed via Directory tab -> Team Builder button.

helpguide_community_hub.details: HelpGuidePanel shows 'Quick Help' button in Community Hub welcome banner with Legend, Troubleshooting, and 'What this page does' tabs

helpguide_logs_analytics.details: HelpGuidePanel shows 'Quick Help' button in LOGS Analytics header area

helpguide_help_center.details: HelpGuidePanel shows 'Quick Help' button in Help Center header

datasource_readiness_snapshot.details: MOCK DATA badge shows on 'Readiness Snapshot' panel in Community Hub (data-testid: data-source-badge-readiness-snapshot)

datasource_skill_coverage.details: MOCK DATA badge shows on 'Skill Coverage Overview' panel in Community Hub (data-testid: data-source-badge-skill-coverage)

datasource_official_teams.details: MOCK DATA badge shows on 'Official Teams & Updates' panel (data-testid: data-source-badge-official-teams)

datasource_logs_analytics.details: MOCK DATA badge shows in LOGS Analytics header (data-testid: data-source-badge-logs-analytics)

team_builder_team_name.details: Team Builder Step 2 has 'Team Name' input field that accepts custom team names

team_builder_icon_selector.details: Team Builder Step 2 has Team Icon selector with 8 icons (Team, Security, Medical, Comms, Engineering, Logistics, Food/Water, Mission)

team_builder_color_selector.details: Team Builder Step 2 has Team Color selector with 6 colors (violet, cyan, rose, amber, emerald, blue)

team_builder_size_cap.details: Team Builder Step 2 shows 'Max: N (connected devices)' for team size cap

team_builder_placeholder_slots.details: Team Builder Step 2 has 'Include Placeholder Slots' checkbox with SIMULATION badge

team_builder_role_coverage.details: Team Builder Step 3 shows 'Role Coverage' with skill names (First Aid, CPR) and multiplier counts (4x, 2x)

team_builder_member_display.details: Team Builder Step 3 shows team members with initials avatars (LW, SC, AP, MS) and match percentages (100%, 50%)

team_builder_coverage_grade.details: Team Builder Step 3 shows coverage completeness indicator (COMPLETE badge)

language_switching.details: Language switching works correctly (EN to ES and back) with proper translations

connection_status_chip.details: Connection status chip shows 'Not Connected' in header (data-testid: connection-status-chip)

screenshots_taken: 01_initial_page.jpeg - Initial page load with 'Not Connected' status
05_logs_analytics.jpeg - LOGS Analytics with Quick Help and MOCK DATA badge
06_help_center.jpeg - Help Center with Quick Help button
07_directory_tab.jpeg - Directory tab with Team Builder button
09_team_builder_step2.jpeg - Team Builder Step 2 with all enhancements
10_team_builder_step3.jpeg - Team Builder Step 3 (Generated Team with Role Coverage)

mocked_apis_list: Team Builder profiles - mock community member data
All panel data is mocked - MOCK DATA badges display correctly
